name: Quantity Boxes
author: TheCartPress team

sections.description:
Lets to display an increment and a decrement button next to inputs of type number in Mozzilla and MSIE.

It can be use in any WordPress installation, although, he has created for eCommerces created with TheCartPress

Unlimited features

  • Quantity Boxes is compatible with TheCartPress and has been developed by TheCartPress Team.

More info and Community

  • TheCartPress Extend: plugins, themes and custom development
  • TheCartPress Demo
  • TheCartPress Community/Support
  • TheCartPress Site
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload Quantity Boxes to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. In TCP Look&Feel menu you can configure it
sections.faq:
Requirements

Up to WodPress 3.1 and TheCartPress 1.2

What is the plugin license?

This plugin is released under a GPL license.
